s: More than 10,000 dogs are registered to come to work at Amazon. Meet some of the dogs who help make Amazon a great place to work.

t: Meet some of the dogs who help make Amazon a great place to work
s: Amazon has a program called Dogs at Work that helps employees bring their dogs to work in a safe way. Some of the program perks include designated spaces for dogs to play, dog-friendly events, discounted pet insurance, welcome packages for registered dogs, and of course, free treats.
